channel.title: Change mercenary portrait border colors with the contract faction!
channel.description:
**Hi there!**
Quick idea here:
What if the portrait border color of the mercenary changes **depending the current contract faction**? Its a really little change, but **can help the mercenary on the trials and when she uses rebound**. Also its a good tool if you dont know at all the **class of your contract**.
Thanks for reading! - **Alan**

item.title: Change mercenary portrait border colors with the contract faction!
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
That assumption generally helps mercs, though. People are less likely to attack you or your target if they know you’re a merc, and of course identifying yourself to your target avoids them attacking you or wasting actions on you. Usually, as a merc, when I whisper my target D1, it’s at least partially intended to give everyone the general sense that I’m their merc.

But I don’t think the basic idea in this thread is good. It should be up to the merc’s target what they want to share - it shouldn’t be revealed to anyone automatically. The mercenary is not part of the same faction as their target and shouldn’t be treated that way.
